news.title: Trump again calls for Fed to cut rates, says Powell’s ‘termination cannot come fast enough’
news.summary: President Donald Trump again called for the Federal Reserve to lower rates. He even hinted at the "termination" of Chair Jerome Powell. The Fed is expected to raise interest rates on Thursday.

news.title: 23andMe bankruptcy under congressional investigation for customer data
news.summary: The House Committee on Energy and Commerce is investigating 23andMe's decision to file for bankruptcy. The House committee is investigating the company's decision to go bankrupt.

news.title: Eli Lilly's weight loss pill succeeds in first late-stage trial on diabetes patients
news.summary: The results bring Eli Lilly's pill orforglipron one step closer to becoming a new, needle-free alternative in the booming weight loss and diabetes market.

news.title: Trump's tariffs are 'inviting corruption,' Democrats tell Bessent, Lutnick
news.summary: The letter underscores a growing attack line as Democratic lawmakers mount their resistance to President Trump's second term. The letter was led by Sen. Elizabeth Warren of Massachusetts.

news.title: China targets U.S. services and other areas as it decries 'meaningless' tariff hikes on goods
news.summary: Beijing has wielded a wide range of punitive measures in recent days to strike back at Washington. The measures include steps targeting American services sector.

news.title: Fed’s Williams says he doesn’t see any need to move rates anytime soon
news.summary: CNN.com will feature iReporter photos in a weekly Travel Snapshots gallery. Please submit your best shots of New York for next week. Visit CNN.com/Travel next Wednesday for a new gallery of snapshots.

news.title: The top 3 excuses people make to put off estate planning — and why they’re all wrong
news.summary: Can these experts talk you out of doing nothing to get your affairs in order before it's too late? Do you have a personal essay to share with the world? Submit at CNN iReport.

news.title: Stock market volatility fuels record revenue for Schwab, and stock surges
news.summary: Broker says higher trading volumes have continued in early April. Broker says high trading volumes continued in late March and early April as well.

news.title: American Express customers are ‘eating out and enjoying life’ as spending grows 6%
news.summary: Amex’s CEO said that recent metrics are “in many cases better than what we saw in 2024.” Amex is a New York-based bank.

news.title: Can Trump fire Powell? Here’s the key court case.
news.summary: Analysts at Evercore led by Krishna Guha said a Supreme Court case will be pivotal after President Donald Trump called for Jerome Powell’s ‘termination’
